manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About US: In 2015, ColdSky was born with a mission to provide customers with high-quality and cost-effective home products. We strive to innovate in both appearance and functionality, breaking the typical mold and surpassing traditional products. At ColdSky, we put product quality first and are committed to providing our customers with the best possible products.
5 Adjustable wind speeds, Instant Cooling in Just 3 Second! Adjustable 5-speed wind modes meet different needs for a customized and comfortable experience

3-in-1 Multifunction Fan Designed with a three-in-one multifunctional design, it can be held in hand, placed on a desktop, or hung around the neck, allowing for easy switching and suitable for various occasions such as outdoor activities, offices, and homes.

Stay Cool Anywhere Due to their compact size and portability, coldSky fans are perfect for outdoor use. They're great to take on trips or for activities such as walking, camping, weddings, concerts, and competitions. The fans can be used in a variety of settings and are the ideal way to ensure that you stay cool and comfortable on even the hottest days.

ultra-quiet operation coldSky silent fan adopting silent motor technology, it operates with extremely low noise, (The lowest noise is below 25 dB), ensuring no disturbance during rest or work, and allowing you to enjoy a cool breeze in a quiet environment.

Non-slip Base The base of the fan can be used as a mobile phone holder, which is convenient for watching videos. Meanwhile, The detachable base is equipped with non-slip pad, which helps increase friction for a firmer placement on the desktop. Detachable Cover, Easy Cleaning Counterclockwise to detach the cover, The cover can be easily removed and cleaned, Note: The fan is not waterproof! USB Type-C Powered A type-c charging cable is included in the box, the portable fan can be charged from a laptop, adapter, power bank, car charger or any other device with 5V output. Only need to charge for 2.5 hours, get up to 20 hours of coolness.

The Best Summer Gifts for Family and Friends With the hot summer days rapidly approaching, ColdSky's handheld fans are the perfect gift to give to your friends and family. Our fans will bring them the cooling sensation they need to beat the heat and stay refreshed throughout the summer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great little fan. I loved the pink color. It doesn’t weigh a lot so you could carry it if you want to. It has 5 speeds and they are great. You can use it without the stand and it stands perfectly. It is very durable and I can see using it for a long time. It’s rechargeable and it shows you how much time is left on the front. Get this fan you will love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but powerful
reviews.reviewText: This cute little fan is perfect for me when I'm drying my hair or applying make up. It has several settings and is adjustable. I love that it is rechargeable. It is a great size for travel. Just seems to tick all the boxes for a convenient, small, yet powerful fan for home or travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This small fan works really well! And holds a charge for a very long time. I use mine at night when doing my skincare routine to dry my face between layers of toner and essence. I’ve had it for over a month and it’s still at 90% battery power. I picked this model because it was affordable, rechargeable and has a digital display of the battery power. That’s so helpful especially when I take it out and about on hot days so I know exactly how long it has left. I highly recommend this small but mighty personal fan!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: the fan is good quality and lighteight the fan settings are also very strong and the battery last very long

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This thing is amazing!!! Super high quality functional sturdy holds a good charge cute small but powerful love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great little personal fan
reviews.reviewText: I like that its a light easy to carry little fan that blows air strongly enough to cool your face. It has 5 speeds but really only needs 3. Low speed is for longer battery life but the battery lasts a long time. The only thing I don't like is that the base is too loose. It should be tighter so it won't come off all the time and get lost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars She be small but mighty
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a family reunion that was to be held outside on a 97⁰ 90% humidity day. I said oh hell no and searched Amazon for fans with next day delivery. I'm glad I bought this one because it kept me quite comfortable. It's powerful enough to keep me cool. And I do believe I'm going through perimenopause because I'm having hot flashes like crazy and this comes in handy. Hands free cooling is great. The battery seems to last pretty long. I charged it when I received it and I haven't had to charge it yet again.It's small. Which is great. It has a little stand so I can leave it on the table, or I can pop it out of the stand and hold it up to my neck or wherever I'm having hot flashes lol.It came with a cord, which idk what to do with so I threw it in a drawer.There's a display screen for battery life, which is nice.My niece and nephew liked it too. They stole it and were using it to cool down and blow their hair around. It's pretty powerful for a little fan.I have no negatives or complaints with this fan. Love it. I might get a few more. It would come in handy for power outages when we would have no AC or fans going. And I wouldn't have to carry it from room to room. Maybe that's what that cord was for. So I'd never be without my handy dandy fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great handheld fan. It is a good size and it has a stand. I use it as part of my skincare regimen to dry my face between the application of products.
